description: Interactive AI portrait that tracks gaze with YOLO, responds through a conversational Unity front end, and never breaks eye contact.

paragraphs: YOLO vision models stream viewer coordinates at sub-25 ms latency, letting the portrait pivot pupils and eyelids with cinematic easing.
A Unity layer runs lip-sync, shader-driven lighting, and gRPC calls into the dialogue engine so answers feel grounded in the scene.
RETRO TAKEAWAY: MIC LATENCY WAS THE ONLY THING BREAKING IMMERSION, SO I BUILT CUSTOM DEVICE PROFILING.
